question: What is the return type of the function announce()?

options.explaination: Incorrect. The function is not returning a string.
Incorrect. It is not returning any boolean value.
Correct. Clearly mentioned and visible in code that console.log is done and nothing is returned.
Incorrect. There is nothing to return which of numeric type.

question: What will console.log(activeMode) display when activeMode = running?

options.explaination: Incorrect. The value is defined to running, it cannot be undefined at all.
Correct. Will show the 1 which is the corresponding index for the "running".
Incorrect. Will not show the string value.
Mode.running is the enum reference, not the console output.
